name: The Book of Pooh: A Story Without A Tail
name_original: The Book of Pooh: A Story Without A Tail
description: Join Winnie the Pooh and his friends on their latest adventure that defines the true meaning of friendship. Eeyore has lost his tail and his dear friends are determined to help. This enriched rendering of Pooh's world invites children in and provides a gentle introduction to early literacy, social, emotional and cognitive skills through fun activities. Get ready to jump into the story in the Hundred Acre Wood!
